pr_title: Improve iconId calculation to handle new semantic types

timeline.message: SO-4051: Update icon ID computation logic

SO-4051: Add placeholder icons for semantic tags that should be...

...used as icon IDs

SO-4051: Treat FSN changes as source relationship changes

Their direct and indirect ancestors need to be added to the taxonomy so
that the concept's iconId can be recalculated.

SO-4051: Add icon placeholder for "product" semantic tag as well

This will help choosing the correct icon for drug-device combination
products.

timeline.author: cmark

replies.bodyText: A status change in either direction may result in the concept's "official" semantic tag changing.
replies.author: apeteri
